ComicInfo.Summary:
Traveling in Arabia as an Ambassador from the exiled FABLES community, Snow White is captured by the local sultan who wants to marry her (and then kill her). But the clever Snow attempts to charm the sultan instead by playing Scheherazade, telling him fantastic stories for a total of 1,001 nights.
Snow White pays a visit to the Seven Dwarfs... one that they'll never forget.
Reynard the Fox helps the Goblin soldiers set up a trap for the other Fable animals. Who's side is he on?
The life and times of Prince Ambrose.
The origin of Bigby Wolf.
While trying to escape the Adversary, Snow White and Rose Red stumble upon Frau Totenkinder's cottage and her corpse.
The origin of Frau Totenkinder.
Snow White and Rose Red bring the rejuvenated Frau Totenkinder with them on their journey, much to Snow White's chagrin.
Old King Cole seeks refuge from the invaders in the company of a very odd collection of characters.
Snow White finishes her 1,001 stories to King Shahryar and now awaits her fate.
